title: Genealogy of Benjamin
summary: The descendants of Benjamin are listed in detail, focusing especially on the family of King Saul. The chapter connects Saul’s lineage to earlier tribal history.

faq.question: Why is Benjamin’s genealogy important?
faq.answer: Because it traces the line to King Saul, Israel’s first king.

faq.question: What does this genealogy show?
faq.answer: That Saul came from a significant and noble lineage in Israel.
